name: Christmas Countdown - ifunny
description:
An exciting Christmas coming soon, Are you ready?
There is an app that can take you to happy together at Christmas, which keeps you updated to how many days, hours, minutes and seconds until Christmas.

Now press this button!
1.funny sounds you can use in your day by day.
2.santa dancing with his elk
3.The magic music will make you swing together

You can listen to the beast music when you are walking or waiting...
If it's funny for you, share the button with your family and friends.
Listen to Christmas songs whilst watching the time creep closer to Christmas.
